text: Island Lake is an unincorporated community in Beltrami County, in the U.S. state of Minnesota. ==History== A post office called Island Lake was established in 1906, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1922. The community took its name from nearby Island Lake. ==References== Category:Former municipalities in Minnesota Category:Unincorporated communities in Beltrami County, Minnesota Category:Unincorporated communities in Minnesota
title: Island Lake, Beltrami County, Minnesota
